languages.text: "Это воистину выдающееся свершение, Ваша Светлость. Футфол теперь сможет спать спокойнее. По крайней мере — до следующего безумного отморозка, мутящего воду".
"That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."
languages.original_text: "Это воистину выдающееся свершение, Ваша Светлость. Футфол теперь сможет спать спокойнее. По крайней мере — до следующего безумного отморозка, мутящего воду".

traits.locale_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."
"That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."
"That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."
"That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."
"That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

languages.text: 「実に素晴らしい業績だ、陛下。フットフォールもこれで安心だな。少なくとも、次にイカれたならず者が頭角を表すまでは心が休まる」
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: 「実に素晴らしい業績だ、陛下。フットフォールもこれで安心だな。少なくとも、次にイカれたならず者が頭角を表すまでは心が休まる」

languages.text: “这可真是了不起的成就，大人。落脚港的人们现在可以放心了，至少在下一个疯子大肆破坏之前，可以暂时安心了。”
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: “这可真是了不起的成就，大人。落脚港的人们现在可以放心了，至少在下一个疯子大肆破坏之前，可以暂时安心了。”

languages.text: «Toda una hazaña la que relata, {mf|milord|milady}. Ahora Paso puede descansar en paz. O al menos hasta que surja otro matón que no esté en sus cabales».
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: «Toda una hazaña la que relata, {mf|milord|milady}. Ahora Paso puede descansar en paz. O al menos hasta que surja otro matón que no esté en sus cabales».

languages.text: « C'est un exploit réellement exceptionnel, Votre Seigneurie. Castel va enfin pouvoir dormir sur ses deux oreilles... jusqu'à l'apparition d'une nouvelle petite frappe un peu trop ambitieuse, du moins. »
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un exploit réellement exceptionnel, Votre Seigneurie. Castel va enfin pouvoir dormir sur ses deux oreilles... jusqu'à l'apparition d'une nouvelle petite frape un peu trop ambitieuse, du moins. »

languages.text: "Das ist eine wirklich herausragende Leistung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Endlich kann Footfall wieder Ruhe finden. Zumindest bis zum Auftauchen des nächsten irren Kriminellen."
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine wirklich herausragende Leistung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Endlich kann Footfall wieder Ruhe finden. Zumindest bis zum Auftauchen des nächsten irren Kriminellen."

languages.text: "Olağanüstü bir başarı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sayenizde Binliman rahat bir nefes alabilecek. En azından bir sonraki külhanbeyi kendini gösterene kadar."
languages.original_text: "That is a truly outstanding accomplishment, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Footfall can now rest easy. At least until the next mad hoodlum makes himself known."

traits.locale_text: "Bu gerçekten olağanüstü bir başarı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Binliman, en azından bir sonraki çılgın serseri kendini ortaya atana kadar rahat bir nefes alabilir."
